prompt: An electronic track built on choppy syncopated breakbeat drums with shuffled snare hits and off-grid hi-hat patterns, no four-on-the-floor kick. A wide atmospheric synth pad fills the stereo field while a catchy synth hook weaves through the broken rhythm. Restless and unpredictable energy. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Rhythm: replace 4-on-floor with syncopated breakbeat (same tempo/key)
